“Welcome to meet The N4S@JAMK Project Team!”

We are a group of students and mentors working for simple target. Speed Up Your Development!

Our main target is to research, develop and invent a solutions in collaboration with N4S Research Program partners

Examples of our works.

Unity3D mockup

Simulation of prototypes in a “natural” environment using Unity3D as the rendering engine.

Debian package repository for TOAS

The repository enables open source community to install and deploy Tieto Open Application Suite for Ubuntu Linux.

Teamboard

“Teamboard is an open source realtime collaboration tool for teams. It targets primarily tablet and desktop users to enable all team members to participate.”
